t:
Something is wrong,
the world is ending.
Everything I touch is falling to pieces.


But I just can't stop
                            touching you.
c:
A new style to Midas' story.



#touch #love #endoftheworld #fallingapart #relationship #breakup #cantstop #twist





As I was typing the caption, I realised, this story actually means much more than I intended. Apart from the twist, it relates so much to life and relationships.
